title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Field Trips
body: Field Trips      Results   Showing results 1-3 of 3    Sort By:  Title Date         Lassen Volcanic National Park Hydrothermal Features    Join a ranger at Sulphur Works or Bumpass Hells parking area for an exploration of Lassen's hydrothermal areas.    Type:Field Trips Grade level:Fifth Grade-Twelfth Grade Subjects:Earth Science, Geology, Physical Science, Tectonics, Volcanoes National/State Standards:California State Standards        Lassen Volcanic National Park Introduction to Lassen    A ranger will meet you at one of many locations throughout the park to provide a brief introduction to Lassen Volcanic National Park.    Type:Field Trips Grade level:Pre-Kindergarten-General Subjects:Earth Science, Geology, Physical Science, Volcanoes National/State Standards:California State Standards        Lassen Volcanic National Park Volcanoes of Lassen Demonstration    This ranger-led program helps students discover all four types of volcanoes, each found at Lassen. Students will learn about the geology and volcanic history of the park.    Type:Field Trips Grade level:Second Grade-Twelfth Grade Subjects:Earth Science, Geology, Physical Science, Tectonics, Volcanoes National/State Standards:California State Standards
